headlines.description: — With Arsenal heading toward another disappointing result, new signing Jorginho came up big to keep the Gunners’ title aspirations on track.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late goals give Arsenal 4-2 win over Villa to halt slide

headlines.description: Brentford substitute Vitaly Janelt headed the equaliser deep into stoppage time to clinch a point for his side in a 1-1 draw with Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brentford snatch last-gasp draw against Palace

headlines.description: Manor Solomon secured a smash-and-grab 1-0 Premier League victory for Fulham at Brighton & Hove Albion.
headlines.shortLinkText: Solomon's late goal seals Fulham win at Brighton

headlines.description: — Chelsea’s season sunk to a new low after the London club lost at home to last-placed Southampton 1-0 in the English Premier League on Saturday in a game that also saw Cesar Azpilicueta carried off on a stretcher with a head injury.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea loses to last-place Southampton 1-0 in a new low

headlines.description: Everton defender Seamus Coleman's goal from the tightest of angles secured a key 1-0 victory over fellow Premier League strugglers Leeds United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton edge fellow strugglers Leeds to claim win

headlines.description: Manchester City suffered a setback in the Premier League title race after drawing 1-1 at Nottingham Forest on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: City drop points in title race with draw at Forest

headlines.description: — Marcus Tavernier marked his return from injury with a winner off his thigh for Bournemouth to squeeze past Wolverhampton 1-0 in their English Premier League relegation fight on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tavernier returns and scores in Bournemouth win at Wolves

headlines.description: — Liverpool won at 10-man Newcastle 2-0 and boosted its push for a top-four finish in the English Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool beats 10-man Newcastle to boost EPL top-4 hopes
